channel.title: Help me plzz im new to this
channel.description:
hey guys
im just getting into this but need a bit of people plz i got this source and client http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=436757.0
which i really like, but need help with teh client i open teh source up and it works but i cant open teh client i just flashes a CMD thats it i cant open it??
some one plzz help me asap

item.title: Help me plzz im new to this
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Yeah. Now, at the very bottom, add ‘pause’.

item.title: Help me plzz im new to this
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

  1. Spell correctly. Spelling ‘the’ as ‘teh’ is stupid.
  2. Add ‘pause’ to the end of your batch file, and it should return a message.

Read full topic
